item.title: What Is Next After the Suicide Attack in Pakistan?
item.description: This morning, a suicide bomber attacked a Shia mosque in Islamabad, Pakistan. The most likely perpetrator is the Islamic Stateâ€“Khorasan Province, which operates both in Afghanistan and Pakistan but has a significant interest in mass-casualty international attacks.
